title: Highlights 1965: a progress report (NASA)
creator_credit: Lewis Baer, Norwood Studios and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: Explains the programs and achievements which were carried out by NASA in 1965. Programs included weather and communication satellites, observatory satellites, deep space probes and manned space flight. The film also shows the participation of countries around the world in these projects.
